title: What it means for UK Drivers under new Laws that use Android Auto
author: Ali Hussan Ahmed
summary: It's been illegal to use a hand held mobile phone while driving, or while stopped with the engine on, since December 2003.  Now with tougher Penalties due to be enforced this Month, drivers will be found breaking the law when they don't even realise they're doing it.
